title: 怎么不能装竹子MOD啊。
author: 夜语星辰
txt_content:
装了竹子MOD玩不了。
不装又做不出来木偶刀。
求帮忙。
版本1.7.10.。。

replies.author: wahaha216
replies.txt_content:
夜语星辰 发表于 2015-3-24 11:27
forge mod loader has found a problem with your minecraft installation you have mod sources that ar ...
貌似装重复了？，要么把1.7.10 竹MOD.jar删掉，要么删bamboo-1.7.10-2.6.8.2

replies.author: 寒江独钓
replies.txt_content: 要和你的版本对应才装得了，下好了放在mod文件夹解压

replies.author: 夜语星辰
replies.txt_content:
我是文明人 发表于 2015-3-24 06:59
要和你的版本对应才装得了，下好了放在mod文件夹解压
forge mod loader has found a problem with your minecraft installation you have mod sources that are duplicate within your system Mod Id :File name 
bamboomod:1.7.10 竹MOD.jar
BambooMod: bamboo-1.7.10-2.6.8.2

replies.author: 夜语星辰
replies.txt_content:

forge mod loader has found a problem with your minecraft installation you have mod sources that ar ...

replies.author: 夜语星辰
replies.txt_content:
我是文明人 发表于 2015-3-24 20:27
把forge删了
谢谢你，研究明白了。。。其实是有MOD。但我没找到竹子而已= =。谢谢你啊。
